    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line(double x1,
            double y1,
            int x2,
            int y2,
            int strokeWeight,
            java.awt.Color c,
            boolean hasFill,
            java.awt.Color s,
            boolean hasStroke)
        Draws a line with the endpoints at (x1, y1) and (x2, y2)
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x-coordinate of the first endpoint
        y1 - the y-coordinate of the first endpoint
        x2 - the x-coordinate of the second endpoint
        y2 - the y-coordinate of the second endpoint
        strokeWeight - the stroke weight of the line
        c - color of the fill of the shape
        hasFill - whether the shape should have a fill
        s - color of the stroke of the shape
        hasStroke - whether the shape should have a stroke

      • Line

        public Line(double x1,
            double y1,
            double length,
            double angle,
            int strokeWeight,
            java.awt.Color c,
            boolean hasFill,
            java.awt.Color s,
            boolean hasStroke)
        Parameters:
        x1 - x-coordinate of the first endpoint
        y1 - y-coordinate of the first endpoint
        length - length of the line
        angle - angle the line is positioned at, measured from the positive x-axis
        strokeWeight - the stroke weight of the line
        c - color of the fill of the shape
        hasFill - whether the shape should have a fill
        s - color of the stroke of the shape
        hasStroke - whether the shape should have a stroke

        Draws this line at the previously specified points and stroke weight
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        drawer - the PApplet object that draws the line
        Precondition:
        drawer settings that are applied beforehand (except stroke weight) affect this line
        Postcondition:
        sets the slope of this line
